`{bm-disable-all}`

ArithmeticConversions.py produced the following alternate forms ...

```
add_to_mul with input a+a ...
    (a+a) ⟶ (2*a)
add_to_mul with input 9+9 ...
    (9+9) ⟶ (2*9)
mul_to_add with input 3*a ...
    (3*a) ⟶ (a+(a+a))
mul_to_add with input 3*9 ...
    (3*9) ⟶ (9+(9+9))
```

`{bm-enable-all}`
